radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild dependent atelectasis in lung bases, no pleural effusion. Inflammatory changes in right lower quadrant surrounding a dilated and thickened appendix, with a 5 mm appendicolith. Several prominent right lower quadrant lymph nodes likely reactive. No signs of perforation, free fluid, or free air. Remainder of the colon notable for diverticulosis. Mild degenerative changes in bones, no acute fracture or suspicious lesion.
